mapper.insert: insert into theme (theme_name, editor_id, type, visible, like_sum) values (#{themeName}, #{editorId}, #{type}, #{visible}, 0)
mapper.select: select theme_id, theme_name, editor_id, type, visible, like_sum from theme where visible = 1 order by like_sum desc limit 10
select theme_id, theme_name, editor_id, type, visible, like_sum from theme where editor_id = #{editorId}
